channel.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories
channel.description: Top stories in the U.S. and world news, politics, health, science, business, music, arts and culture. Nonprofit journalism with a mission. This is NPR.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

image.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories

item.title: Supreme Court appears split in tax foreclosure case
item.description: At issue is whether a county can seize homeowners' residence for unpaid property taxes and sell the house at auction for less than the homeowners would get if they put their home on the market themselves.
item.content:encoded:
At issue is whether a county can seize homeowners' residence for unpaid property taxes and sell the house at auction for less than the homeowners would get if they put their home on the market themselves. 

(Image credit: Heather Diehl)
item.dc:creator: Nina Totenberg

item.title: Top House Dem wants Justice Department to explain missing Trump-related Epstein files
item.description: After NPR reporting revealed dozens of pages of Epstein files related to President Trump appear to be missing from the public record, a top House Democrat wants to know why.
item.content:encoded:
After NPR reporting revealed dozens of pages of Epstein files related to President Trump appear to be missing from the public record, a top House Democrat wants to know why.

(Image credit: Win McNamee)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: ICE won't be at polling places this year, a Trump DHS official promises
item.description: In a call with top state voting officials, a Department of Homeland Security official stated unequivocally that immigration agents would not be patrolling polling places during this year's midterms.
item.content:encoded:
In a call with top state voting officials, a Department of Homeland Security official stated unequivocally that immigration agents would not be patrolling polling places during this year's midterms.

(Image credit: Olga Fedorova)
item.dc:creator: Miles Parks

item.title: Cubans from US killed after speedboat opens fire on island's troops, Havana says
item.description: Cuba says the 10 passengers on a boat that opened fire on its soldiers were armed Cubans living in the U.S. who were trying to infiltrate the island and unleash terrorism. Secretary of State Marco Rubio says the U.S. is gathering its own information.
item.content:encoded:
Cuba says the 10 passengers on a boat that opened fire on its soldiers were armed Cubans living in the U.S. who were trying to infiltrate the island and unleash terrorism. Secretary of State Marco Rubio says the U.S. is gathering its own information.

(Image credit: Kevin S. Vineys)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Tipped workers expect tax boon this year, but not a long-term fix
item.description: In his State of the Union address on Tuesday night, President Trump once again touted new tax benefits for tipped workers, who like many Americans are feeling the pinch of higher prices.
item.content:encoded:
In his State of the Union address on Tuesday night, President Trump once again touted new tax benefits for tipped workers, who like many Americans are feeling the pinch of higher prices.

(Image credit: Mark Schiefelbein)
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett

item.title: Surgeon general nominee Means questioned about vaccines, birth control and financial conflicts
item.description: During a confirmation hearing, senators asked Dr. Casey Means about her current positions and her past statements on a range of public health issues.
item.content:encoded:
During a confirmation hearing, senators asked Dr. Casey Means about her current positions and her past statements on a range of public health issues.

(Image credit: Brendan Smialowski)
item.dc:creator: Will Stone

item.title: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame 2026 shortlist includes Lauryn Hill, Shakira and Wu-Tang Clan
item.description: The shortlist also includes a 1990s pop diva, heavy metal pioneers and a legendary R&B singer and producer.
item.content:encoded:
The shortlist also includes a 1990s pop diva, heavy metal pioneers and a legendary R&B singer and producer.

(Image credit: Kevin Mazur)
item.dc:creator: Isabella Gomez Sarmiento

item.title: This novel about family drama is so good you may want to re-read it immediately
item.description: Allegra Goodman's new novel is called This Is Not About Us, but critic Maureen Corrigan says that title is coy: Readers are bound to see aspects of themselves and their families in these pages.
item.content:encoded: Allegra Goodman's new novel is called This Is Not About Us, but critic Maureen Corrigan says that title is coy: Readers are bound to see aspects of themselves and their families in these pages.
item.dc:creator: Maureen Corrigan

item.title: Actor Stellan Skarsgård doesn't believe in bad guys
item.description: Skarsgård plays a filmmaker struggling to connect with his two grown daughters in Sentimental Value. As the father of eight, the Swedish actor says he understands the tension his character faces.
item.content:encoded:
Skarsgård plays a filmmaker struggling to connect with his two grown daughters in Sentimental Value. As the father of eight, the Swedish actor says he understands the tension his character faces.

(Image credit: Chris Pizzello)
item.dc:creator: Dave Davies

item.title: Kalshi reveals insider trading case against editor for MrBeast
item.description: With prediction markets booming, so have concerns about insider trading. Now, Kalshi has disclosed its first public actions against accounts suspected of trading on confidential information.
item.content:encoded:
With prediction markets booming, so have concerns about insider trading. Now, Kalshi has disclosed its first public actions against accounts suspected of trading on confidential information.

(Image credit: Rebecca Blackwell)
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn
